Describes one position where the user have been. More...

Detailed Description

Describes one position where the user have been.

UserTrackElement::UserTrackElement (  int32  lat,
int32  lon,
uint32  dist,
uint16  speed,
uint16  heading,
uint32  time,
const char *  source
) 
 

Create a new UserTrackElement from data sent as parameters.

Parameters:
lat The latitude-part of the position.
lon The longitude-part of the position.
dist The distnace traveled from last track-element.
speed The speed at the position in m/s * 32.
heading The heading in degrees.
time The time (and date) for when the user was at this location.
source The origin of the information, might be an ID of a userigator or something else. Must be a short string (max 16 bytes).

Destructor.
